definition: (literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
(dialect) to make money
to earn one's living (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 謀生|谋生[mou2 sheng1]

sentences.english: I know how to make money grow.
Then, how can men find their women?
sentences.chinese: 咁，男人點樣先搵到個女人系隔離？

sentences.english: So that could u mind tell me where can i get it ???
sentences.chinese: 黑媽媽兄，我都想知你所講對鏡邊到搵到？
佢本人都好想出國搵食。

sentences.english: Please do remember that i always miss you .
sentences.chinese: 我會一直等妳嚟搵我嘎。

sentences.english: Thank you South Ho for lending me his everyday tool-of-trade.
sentences.chinese: 鳴謝阿南謝出他的搵食工具。

sentences.english: She, at once, go to hospital to find her friend of Jane and to discuss countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 急搵來系醫院做嘢嘅好友青，商量對策。

sentences.english: Do you intend to find the Chinese Embassy?
sentences.chinese: 你想話搵中國大使館咩？

sentences.english: He asked me to look at the Hong Kong Government in the Office.
sentences.chinese: 佢讓我搵香港政府駐日事務處。

definition: used in transliteration
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
possessive particle (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 的[de5]
he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
some/few/a little (Cantonese)
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
to confer on/to give to
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
home/family (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 家[jia1]
thing/matter (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
